settings.Heading:
THE GIFT OF FOOD IS
THE GIFT OF LOVE
settings.content:
Our gift vouchers are the modern equivalent of bringing around a casserole to a loved one – but even better because the recipient can choose for themselves exactly what they’d like and when they’d like to receive it.
When you order a gift voucher, it will be sent immediately to your email address, with whatever message you’d like to include. You can then print it out or just email it on.
Giving someone a few nights off cooking to say "thank you", "congratulations" or "we're thinking about you" always goes down well, whatever the circumstances.
